description: 70 million tweets, 38 hours, 20 minutes, and 88 percent: Can you guess what these numbers mean?
title: Gamers and 3-D scanning: This week's Silicon Tally
contentencoded:
It's quiz time on Marketplace Tech. 70 million tweets, 38 hours, 20 minutes, and 88 percent: Can you guess what these numbers mean?

We put Julie Klausner, host of the podcast How Was Your Week? to the test for our latest edition of Silicon Tally. 

Julie Klausner's podcast How Was Your Week? releases a new episode every Friday. 

Click on the audio player above to play along.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 20, 2013
